charges.charge_description: 21:846-Conspiracy to violate 21:841(a)(1) 21:841B=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (cocaine) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 72 months to run concurrent with counts 1-3 of criminal docket no. 3:99-33. Upon release from imprisonment the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 4 years to run concurrent with criminal docket no. 3:99-33, along with the folling special conditions: 1. The defendant shall participate in a drug program which includes drug testing as directed by the USPO. 2. Upon completion of his term of imprisonment, the defendant is be surrendered to a duly authorized immigration official for deportation consideration in accordance with established procedures provided by the Immigration and Natuarlization Act. Should defendant be deported by the Immigration and Naturalization Service, he shall not re-enter the US while on supervised release. Special Assessment of $100 is due. Defendant remanded to the custody of the USM. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:963-Conspiracy to violate 21:952 and 960 (21:960A=NI.F NARCOTICS-IMPORT) cocaine, a schedule II controlled substance (2)
21:846-Conspiracy to violate 21:841(a)(1) 21:841B=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (cocaine) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 33 months. Upon release from imprisonment the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of 4 years with the following special condition: 1. The defendant shall perform 100 hours of community service within the first 2 years of supervised release as directed by the US Probation Office. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons as notified by the USM. Special Assessment of $100 is due immediately. (1)
